item.description:
The November group was great. We had 5 people attend, of varying skill levels. It was a lot of fun, sharing and knitting together.

Because some people could not attend on Wednesday nights, we've decided to meet in December on the second TUESDAY night, Dec. 11, at 7pm, at the Newington Starbucks, once again.

Come to share, knit together, and for conversation,

Shirley
item.name: The Newington Knitting December Meetup
